meanings.definition: The part of a printer that applies ink to paper.
meanings.sent1: The printhead in the printer moves back and forth to put ink on the paper.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to clean the printhead regularly to maintain print quality.
meanings.sent3: The printhead decided to take a break and refused to print anything.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed from her mouth like a printhead, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The printhead hummed softly as it worked its magic on the paper.

meanings.definition: A device that transfers ink onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: The printhead on the industrial printer is very efficient.
meanings.sent2: The artist used a specialized printhead to create intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the printhead, causing ink to spill everywhere.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling was like a printhead, transferring emotions onto the listener.
meanings.sent5: The printhead glided smoothly over the canvas, leaving a trail of vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The component of a printing machine that dispenses ink onto paper.
meanings.sent1: Without the printhead, the printer cannot produce any documents.
meanings.sent2: The technician replaced the faulty printhead to fix the printing issue.
meanings.sent3: The printhead got tired of printing only black and white documents.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a printhead, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The printhead danced across the page, creating a masterpiece of words and images.
